data.actual_result: You swipe to the member list / channel list but then the invite your friends screen shows up
data.expected_result: Invite your friends screen should not appear and only shows the member / channel list
data.short_description: Swiping to member list / channel list from initially touching the Invite Your Friends button still opens it regardless
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap and hold on the invite your friends button - Swipe either to the left or right to see member list or channel list
